snippet.title: Girl Abducted - The Game - Trailer #2
snippet.description:
Hey, I’m Riley—chaos queen, tentacle dodger, and protector of my awkward but lovable sister, Tina. Life’s been crazy—dodging alien abductions, blowing up slimy bunkers, and, oh yeah, dealing with Tina’s awful ex. Trust me, saving the world is easier than dealing with that douche.

Here’s the deal: we’re in serious trouble, and we need your help. Join us in 'Girl Abducted' on Steam to help blow stuff up, solve some puzzles, and maybe keep us alive. I’m handling the guns, Tina’s bringing the nerdy vibes, and you? You’re our new hero.

Click that Steam link, wishlist Girl Abducted, and let’s kick some alien butt together. Don’t leave me stuck here with Tina’s ex—please.

AVAILABLE NOW!
Steam Page: store.steampowered.com/app/3373050/Girl_Abducted
Itch.io: https://renderready.itch.io/girl-abducted
